attributes.action: INTRODUCE THE DEATH PENALTY FOR PAEDOPHILES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government is forever telling us children are our future its about time we protected them. The paedophiles are now getting more bolder and striking anywhere ie supermarkets childrens own homes when there in a bath they do this because there is no deterant well its about time there was and that this country gave the death penalty to paedophiles and protected all our children and our future thankyou.
